Weather forecast

This component demonstrates fetching data from the server.

Loading...

Date Temp. (C) Temp. (F) Summary
{{ forecast.title }}
import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-fetch-data', templateUrl: './fetch-data.component.html' }) export class FetchDataComponent { public forecasts: HackerNewsStory[] = []; constructor(private http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') private baseUrl: string) { this.get(""); } get(searchTerm: string) { this.http.get(this.baseUrl + 'weatherforecast').subscribe(result => { this.forecasts = result; }, error => console.error(error)); } } interface HackerNewsStory { title: string; by: string; url: string; }
